channel.title: RuneElevation 667/729| Dicing | Flower Game | Minigames | Grand Exchange l Etc
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/runeelevation.png[/img][/center]
[center]RuneElevation is an amazing server with many amazing features that other servers don't have! We are 24.7 VPS Hosted, we have 15+ players on daily, and we hope to get more in the future, We do need staff. Our main goal is to take rsps's to a brand new level.[/center]
Website:[url=http://rune-elevation.com/]http://rune-elevation.com/[/url] Download:[url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/95699771/RuneElevation.jar]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/95699771/RuneElevation.jar[/url] PlayNow:[url=http://rune-elevation.com/webclient.html]http://rune-elevation.com/webclient.html[/url]
What Do We Have?:
Grand Exchange PolyPore Staff/Dungeon 100% Mage Book 100% Weed Smoking 100% Awesome Random Events (Tons More Being Added) Perfect Economy Perfected Skills Awesome Skilling Zone Awesome Skilling Locations Great Money Making Fun Staff Active and Nice Owner Prestiging With Rewards and Ranks XP Locking/Unlocking 100% Bork 100% Nomad 100% Nex 100% GWD's 100% Bosses Flawless Pk Point System Pk Point Shop Shopping Area Beast Dungeons Daily Updates Active Coders Loyalty Emotes/System Not A Matrix Leech Prefected Slayer and Tasks Awesome Summoning Custom and Beast Dungeoneering Custom Armour Custom Game Content Perfect Exp Rates 100% Glacors Drop Party at 50 Players MrEx Gives Hats For Pk Kills Perfected Pk Areas Beautiful Website Key and Chest System 100% Bones on Altar 100% Growing Community Perfect Switching QBD KBD Full Jadinko Full Barrows Warriors Guild Custom Hararken Boss Steadfast, Ragefire, Glavien Boots Addicting And Super Fun Perfect and Fixed Trade And More...
[size=14pt][b]Warning: Server Is Very Addicting!!![/b][/size]
Pictures:

@Clawz_Own_U wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]RuneElevation is an amazing server with many amazing features that other servers don’t have! We are 24.7 VPS Hosted, we have 15+ players on daily, and we hope to get more in the future, We do need staff. Our main goal is to take rsps’s to a brand new level.[/center]

Website:http://rune-elevation.com/
Download:https://dl.dropbox.com/u/95699771/RuneElevation.jar
PlayNow:http://rune-elevation.com/webclient.html

What Do We Have?:

Grand Exchange
PolyPore Staff/Dungeon 100%
Mage Book 100%
Weed Smoking 100%
Awesome Random Events (Tons More Being Added)
Perfect Economy
Perfected Skills
Awesome Skilling Zone
Awesome Skilling Locations
Great Money Making
Fun Staff
Active and Nice Owner
Prestiging With Rewards and Ranks
XP Locking/Unlocking
100% Bork
100% Nomad
100% Nex
100% GWD’s
100% Bosses
Flawless Pk Point System
Pk Point Shop
Shopping Area
Beast Dungeons
Daily Updates
Active Coders
Loyalty Emotes/System
Not A Matrix Leech
Prefected Slayer and Tasks
Awesome Summoning
Custom and Beast Dungeoneering
Custom Armour
Custom Game Content
Perfect Exp Rates
100% Glacors
Drop Party at 50 Players
MrEx Gives Hats For Pk Kills
Perfected Pk Areas
Beautiful Website
Key and Chest System 100%
Bones on Altar 100%
Growing Community
Perfect Switching
QBD
KBD
Full Jadinko
Full Barrows
Warriors Guild
Custom Hararken Boss
Steadfast, Ragefire, Glavien Boots
Addicting And Super Fun

And More…
